content: Fixaro URL Structure Migration - 2025-11-02. Successfully implemented complete SEO URL structure migration for Fixaro. New URL pattern: /{lang}/professionals/{country}/{city}/{service}/ and /{lang}/jobs/{country}/{city}/{service}/. Renamed routes: /professionals/[id]/ ‚Üí /professional/[slug]/ and /jobs/[jobId]/ ‚Üí /job/[slug]/ to avoid route conflicts. Created 10 new route pages with ISR (300s revalidation), generateStaticParams, and generateMetadata. Implemented 301 redirects in middleware.ts for old URL structure. Updated sitemap.ts with dynamic URL generation for all country/city/service combinations. Created Breadcrumbs component with Schema.org BreadcrumbList structured data. Added IRONCLAD rules to CLAUDE.md: URL structure is immutable for SEO, requires 301 redirects for any changes. Build stats: 4510 static pages generated in 35.6s. Deployed to both dev.fixaro.pro and fixaro.pro (production). Performance: Page load 1076ms, Full load 2096ms (both within targets). All URLs tested and working: EN/IT, DE/IT, UA/PL, IT/DE combinations verified. Hreflang tags working for 9 languages: en, it, de, pl, fr, es, ro, nl, ua. Sitemap accessible at /sitemap.xml. Files changed: 47, Lines added: 5826+. Autonomous workflow executed: PM Agent ‚Üí TodoWrite ‚Üí 10 parallel sub-agents ‚Üí Build ‚Üí Test ‚Üí Dev deploy ‚Üí Production deploy ‚Üí Verification

Fixaro URL Routes Structure. Professionals routes: /[lang]/professionals/[country]/, /[lang]/professionals/[country]/[city]/, /[lang]/professionals/[country]/[city]/[service]/. Jobs routes: /[lang]/jobs/[country]/, /[lang]/jobs/[country]/[city]/, /[lang]/jobs/[country]/[city]/[service]/. Individual profiles: /[lang]/professional/[slug]/ (singular, renamed from /professionals/[id]/). Individual jobs: /[lang]/job/[slug]/ (singular, renamed from /jobs/[jobId]/). Trailing slash is mandatory for all URLs (enforced by middleware). 301 redirects implemented for old structure ‚Üí new structure. Supported countries: IT, DE, PL, FR, ES, RO, NL (7 countries). Geo utilities created: src/lib/geo/countries.ts and src/lib/geo/cities.ts. Each route has ISR with 300s revalidation, SEO metadata, and Schema.org structured data

Language Routing Fix - 2025-11-06. Fixed critical language routing issue where HTML lang attribute stayed 'en' for all languages. Root cause: Duplicate <html> tags in app/layout.tsx (hardcoded lang='en') and app/[lang]/layout.tsx (dynamic lang). Solution: Deleted app/layout.tsx, moved Analytics and ThemeProvider to app/[lang]/layout.tsx. Result: HTML lang now correctly changes based on URL (/en/ ‚Üí lang='en', /it/ ‚Üí lang='it', /ua/ ‚Üí lang='ua', etc.). Affected routes: All 9 languages (en, it, de, pl, fr, es, ro, nl, ua). Commit: 292d132 'fix: resolve language routing - remove duplicate html tag in root layout'. Tested with Playwright: 'should handle all 10 languages' test now verifies lang attribute changes. SEO impact: Positive - proper lang attribute improves multilingual SEO. Build verified successful after fix: 4636 pages, exit code 0
